name: Width/Depth Ratio
functionStatement: Long-term changes in channel size and slope maintain dynamic equilibrium and diverse habitats while interacting with the floodplain.
descriptionMarkdown: Channel dimension indicator used to infer incision/widening or departure from reference geometry.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Measure bankfull width and mean depth at representative cross sections; compute W/D and compare to expected (regional curves or SQT reference).

inputs.label: Width/Depth Ratio
inputs.helpMarkdown: Field channel geometry (bankfull width/depth) and regional expectations/curves.

references: Regional hydraulic geometry/bankfull field guides where available
